body: Please can I contact a staff member about a incedent that happeded today where a player , was swearing lots and lots . I have many, many screenshots and I would like to send them to a staff member that can deal with this situation !

title: Please read....

replies.body: Please file an online report on the forums. If you post it here, the issue will be dealt with. Thanks a lot! :)
